privacy.intro: Artifi Labs is committed to privacy and transparency. This Privacy Policy outlines what data we collect and how it is used.

paragraphs.analytics1: We use PostHog to collect limited analytics and application telemetry. This helps us understand how the app is used and identify bugs or performance issues.
paragraphs.analytics2: Data collected by PostHog does not include personally identifiable information. We do not store wallet addresses, names, emails, or any user credentials.
paragraphs.analytics3: All analytics are used strictly for the purpose of improving the application experience.
paragraphs.authentication: The application does not use or require any user accounts, logins, or email registration. Access is anonymous.
